data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio Capital do Movel.
Porto needs to be cautious. Pacos Ferreira have an attacking throw-in.
Can Pacos Ferreira capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Porto's half?
In the minute 3, In Pacos de Ferreira a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball safe as Porto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 7, Throw-in Porto.
Throw-in for Porto in their own half.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 8, Goal kick for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio Capital do Movel.
Can Porto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In the minute 11, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Dor Jan.
Porto's Evanilson is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in high up the field for Porto in Pacos de Ferreira.
In the minute 14, Porto have been awarded a corner by Nuno Almeida.
Porto's Marko Grujic attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Pacos de Ferreira.
In the minute 14, Nuno Almeida awards the away team a throw-in.
Pacos Ferreira to take a throw-in in Porto territory.
Pacos Ferreira are coming forward and Helder Ferreira gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 15, Ball goes out of play for a Porto goal kick.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Pacos de Ferreira to check on Bruno Costa, who is grimacing with pain.
Bruno Costa returns to the field for Pacos Ferreira after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Porto in their own half.
Free kick Porto.
Pacos Ferreira have a goal kick.
In the minute 19, Nuno Almeida signals a Porto throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half.
Nuno Almeida awards the home team a throw-in.
Porto have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Porto close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Porto in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Porto.
In the minute 23, In Pacos de Ferreira Porto attack through Sergio Oliveira. The finish is off target, however.
Nuno Almeida awards Pacos Ferreira a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Porto.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Attention is being given to Pacos Ferreiraâ€™s Stephen Eustaquio and play has been suspended briefly.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
In the minute 28, Porto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nuno Almeida signals a throw-in for Porto, close to Pacos Ferreira's area.
Throw-in for Porto in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Porto at Estadio Capital do Movel.
Corner awarded to Porto.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 34, Luther Singh of Pacos Ferreira gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Porto at Estadio Capital do Movel.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Pacos de Ferreira.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira close to the penalty box.
Nuno Almeida signals a throw-in for Pacos Ferreira, close to Porto's area.
Free kick for Porto in their own half.
In the minute 41, Stephen Eustaquio for Pacos Ferreira is back on the field again.
Ball safe as Pacos Ferreira is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Porto to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
In the minute 43, Goal! Pacos Ferreira extend their lead to 2-0 through Stephen Eustaquio.
Helder Ferreira with an assist there.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Porto.
The 1st half is prolonged by 6 minutes of added time.
Throw-in for Porto in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 45, Nuno Almeida awards Pacos Ferreira a goal kick.
In Pacos de Ferreira a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Porto have been awarded a penalty...
The first-half has come to a close in Pacos de Ferreira.
In the minute 45, Goal! Sergio Oliveira nets a penalty for Porto. They now trail 2-1.
The second-half is underway in Pacos de Ferreira.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Porto.
In the minute 46, Luis Diaz is replacing Mateus Uribe for Porto at Estadio Capital do Movel.
Shoya Nakajima is on a sub for Marko Grujic for Porto.
In the minute 47, Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Nuno Almeida.
Ball safe as Porto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nuno Almeida signals a Porto throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half.
In the minute 48, Can Porto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick Porto.
In the minute 49, Ball goes out of play for a Pacos Ferreira goal kick.
Throw-in for Porto at Estadio Capital do Movel.
Porto awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Pacos Ferreira will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Porto.
Sergio Oliveira (Porto) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in high up the field for Porto in Pacos de Ferreira.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Porto in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Porto in their own half.
Pacos Ferreira's Luther Singh breaks free at Estadio Capital do Movel. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Porto have a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira just outside Porto's area.
Pacos Ferreira push forward at Estadio Capital do Movel and Stephen Eustaquio gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Porto defence.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
In Pacos de Ferreira, Helder Ferreira of Pacos Ferreira is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Pacos Ferreira's Marco Baixinho gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Capital do Movel. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 57, Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Nuno Almeida.
Penalty! Nuno Almeida points to the spot, great chance for Pacos Ferreira...
Pacos Ferreira are going well in Pacos de Ferreira. They now lead 3-1 thanks to a Bruno Costa penalty.
In the minute 61, Can Porto capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Pacos Ferreira's half?
Free kick Porto.
Porto's Jesus Corona misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 61, Nuno Almeida awards Pacos Ferreira a goal kick.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira.
Pacos Ferreira's Stephen Eustaquio misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 64, Porto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Porto.
Nuno Almeida signals a Porto throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half.
In the minute 65, Pacos Ferreira awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Pacos Ferreira drives forward and Bruno Costa gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Mehdi Taremi is replacing Moussa Marega for the away team.
In the minute 67, Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
In Pacos de Ferreira, Luther Singh (Pacos Ferreira) misses the target with a header.
Porto have a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Porto in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Pacos de Ferreira.
In Pacos de Ferreira a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 69, Porto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pacos Ferreira needs to be cautious. Porto have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Pacos Ferreira to take a throw-in in Porto territory.
In the minute 72, Sergio Conceicao is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Capital do Movel with Felipe Anderson replacing Evanilson.
Porto have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 74, Throw-in high up the field for Porto in Pacos de Ferreira.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Pepa (Pacos Ferreira) is making a first substitution, with Mohamed Diaby replacing Luiz Carlos.
In the minute 75, The home team have replaced Helder Ferreira with Joao Amaral. This is the second substitution made today by Pepa.
Free kick for Porto in their own half.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
In the minute 77, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Porto close to the penalty box.
Otavio puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 3-2.
In the minute 79, Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Pacos Ferreira.
Marco Baixinho (Pacos Ferreira) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 81, Ball goes out of play for a Porto goal kick.
Pacos Ferreira are pushing forward but Joao Amaral's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Porto at Estadio Capital do Movel.
In the minute 83, Pacos Ferreira make their third substitution with Joao Pedro replacing Dor Jan.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Porto.
In the minute 84, Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Joao Pedro is booked for the home team.
Porto's Sergio Oliveira has been booked in Pacos de Ferreira.
Free kick for Porto in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 86, Shoya Nakajima (Porto) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Porto capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Pacos Ferreira's half?
In the minute 87, Nuno Almeida awards the home team a throw-in.
Sergio Conceicao (Porto) is making a fifth substitution, with Fabio Vieira replacing Sergio Oliveira.
Throw-in for Porto in their own half.
The home team replace Luther Singh with Uilton.
In the minute 89, Can Pacos Ferreira get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Porto's half?
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In Pacos de Ferreira a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Pacos de Ferreira, Joao Pedro (Pacos Ferreira) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
At Estadio Capital do Movel the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Nuno Almeida.
Oleg Reabciuk's header is off-target for Pacos Ferreira.
Porto have a goal kick.
Pacos Ferreira needs to be cautious. Porto have an attacking throw-in.
Porto have been awarded a corner by Nuno Almeida.
Porto have a dangerous throw-in.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Porto in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 3-2.
